chapters.title: Chapter 53: Gateways
chapters.info: Elmiara, p. 786—Character in “Elmiara and the Shadoweyes,” one of Thom's stories. She spent a hundred days wandering in a maze, looking for the healing spring of Sund to save her lover's life. Her story is true: it describes Birgitte's efforts to save Gaidal by entering the Tower of Ghenjei.
